entry.value: select e.member_id as member_id, e.surname as surname, e.first_name as firstname, e.middle_name as middlename,e.dob as dob, e.gender as gender,e.phone_no_1 as phone_no_1, e.phone_no_2 as phone_no_2, e.phone_no_3 as phone_no_3, e.email_add_1 as email_add_1, e.email_add_2 as email_add_2 , e.email_add_3 as email_add_3, e.member_no as member_no, f.religion_name as religion_name, a.member_type_val as type_val, b.name as comp_name, c.branch_name as branch_name,e.member_comp_id as comp_mem_id, d.identification_doc_name as iden_doc_name, e.identification_code as ident_code,e.nok_name as nok_name,e.nok_middle_name as nok_middlename, e.nok_surname as nok_surname, e.nok_phone as nok_phone, g.bank_name as bank_name,e.bank_account as bank_account, h.member_contrib_value as member_contrib_value,sum(i.holdings) as holdings from member e inner join religion f on f.religion_id=e.religion_id inner join member_type a on a.member_type_id=e.member_type_id inner join company b on e.company_id=b.id inner join branch c on e.branch_id=c.id inner join identification_doc d on e.identification_id=d.identification_doc_id left join banks g on e.bank_id = g.bank_id left join member_contribution h on e.member_id = h.member_id left join member_holdings i on e.member_id = i.member_id
SELECT a.ADDR_FIELD_NAME as addr_fld,a.ADDR_FIELD_VALUE as addr_val, b.TYPE_NAME as addr_type from address_entries a, address_type b
SELECT a.ADDR_FIELD_NAME as addr_fld,a.ADDR_FIELD_VALUE as addr_val, b.TYPE_NAME as addr_type from address_entries a, address_type b
SELECT a.ADDR_FIELD_NAME as addr_fld,a.ADDR_FIELD_VALUE as addr_val, b.TYPE_NAME as addr_type from address_entries a, address_type b
SELECT a.ADDR_FIELD_NAME as addr_fld,a.ADDR_FIELD_VALUE as addr_val, b.TYPE_NAME as addr_type from address_entries a, address_type b

SELECT a.accountno as accountno, a.name as name, asegc, abs(balance) as balance,a.dateopened as dateopened from accounts a inner join member b on a.asegc = b.member_no and a.branch = b.branch_id and a.companyid = b.company_id inner join custaccountdetails c on a.Branch = c.Branchid and a.Companyid= c.Companyid and a.AccountNo = c.AccountNo inner join products d on c.Branchid = d.branch_id and c.Companyid = d.company_id and c.Product = d.code

SELECT a.accountno as accountno, a.name as name, asegc, abs(balance) as balance,a.dateopened as dateopened from accounts a inner join member b on a.asegc = b.member_no and a.branch = b.branch_id and a.companyid = b.company_id inner join custaccountdetails c on a.Branch = c.Branchid and a.Companyid= c.Companyid and a.AccountNo = c.AccountNo inner join products d on c.Branchid = d.branch_id and c.Companyid = d.company_id and c.Product = d.code
and a.TYPE_ID=b.ID and b.TYPE_NAME='MEMBER OFFICE' and a.KEY_ID=
and a.TYPE_ID=b.ID and b.TYPE_NAME='MEMBER HOME' and a.KEY_ID=
and a.TYPE_ID=b.ID and b.TYPE_NAME='MEMBER CORRESPONDENCE' and a.KEY_ID=
and a.TYPE_ID=b.ID and b.TYPE_NAME='MEMBER NEXT OF KIN' and a.KEY_ID=
